message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $8,000 to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is higher to you, but based on my needs, I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $9,500 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about $9,800? This would be a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $9,600 for it. I believe this price is fair for both of us.
